articles.title: He showed class character: Suryakumar lauds Ravi Bishnoi - Rediff.com
articles.description: India captain Suryakumar Yadav lauded rookie leg-spinner Ravi Bishnoi for his great recovery in the T20I series against Australia after a rough start.

articles.title: Vaishali Rameshbabu Becomes Grandmaster, Creating History with Brother Praggnanandhaa - Adda247
